Description: An exciting opportunity has arisen for a Tendering Engineer to join our Commercial team in Amman. Coming from a strong operational and commercial background, you will be responsible for the preparation of formal sales tenders and quotations, to meet our clients’ needs.Roles and responsibilities:1. Reviewing and managing customers’ inquiries and tenders.2. Coordinating all aspects of the bid preparation process.3. Preparing proposal/quotation documents, technical specifications, price schedules, etc.4. Developing costing as part of the quotation process and internal calculation sheets.5. Acting as the company’s internal contact point for the customer during the inquiry and bidding process.6. Responding to customer questions and requests in an efficient manner.7. Following up on proposals by maintaining and updating the Sales programs.8. Sourcing of new vendors and products.9. Coordinating with the Sales team and providing all required information.Skills
Skills:
Communication & organizational skills.
Attention to detail.
Good grammar and technical report writing skills.
Flexibility and ability to adapt to change
BSc Degree in related domain.
Experience of dealing with complex tenders.
Experience of contract negotiation in a commercial environment.
General MS Office Program skills.
